titlepage.publisher: Special Collections, University of Virginia Library

archdesc.runner: Special Collections, University of Virginia Library

did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, University of Virginia Library
did.unittitle:
Hugh Kenner Papers
1965-1974

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Hugh Kenner Papers, Accession # 7826-a, 7826-b, Special Collections, University of Virginia Library, Charlottesville, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This collection was acquired on 14 and 15 December, 1976.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: The collection contains typescripts of The Counterfeiters, 1968, and A Homemade World, 1974, drafts, ca. 1965-70, of The Pound era,and drafts, 1972, of A Reader's Guide to Samuel Beckett. Some correspondence and a few clippings are included.
Typescript, final draft with autograph corrections and additions.
